entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
